price: Na walio kufuru, basi kwao ni maangamizo, na atavipoteza vitendo vyao.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: Na walio kufuru Mwenyezi Mungu atawatia mashakani, na atawapotoa vitendo vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
